description:
Great apartment in the middle of everything! Charming, airy and walking distance to SoHo, West Village and Lower East Side. Near subway lines to get you anywhere in the city (B,D,F,M,N,R,Q,6). My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The location is amazing - so close to the best parts of downtown New York City!

Access to the kitchen and pots, pans, etc for cooking. TV available with cable, Netflix, and HBO.

Not too often - we are often out of town or at work and keep to ourselves for the most part when we are in the apartment.

Best restaurants, interesting people and CONVENIENCE!

Many subway lines close to get you anywhere in Manhattan or Brooklyn quickly.
name: Great apt in amazing East Village!
review: We loved our stay in the city! Thank you for letting us stay!
